transcript: You think there are times when you look at me like I was a used Kleenex? How did I look at you and think, holy hell, I wasn't excited to Alaska?

segments.text: You think there are times when you look at me like I was a used Kleenex?
How did I look at you and think, holy hell, I wasn't excited to Alaska?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: You think there would be times when you'd look at me like I was used Kleenex and then I'd look at you and think "Holy hell when is the next flight to Alaska."
